1467590.name: Frontiers Reach
1467590.description:
Strap into the cockpit of a retro-futuristic starfighter as you fight through the ravages of an interstellar war in over 32 story missions, 15 side missions, and a dynamic warmap with over 2000 possible scenario variations.

An epic story of survival in an interstellar war

It is the year 2230. After nearly 100 years of expansion and colonization in space, the human species now stands on the brink of war. On one side is the corrupt and aging Sol Confederacy. On the other is the fledgling, Frontier Republic.

Neither one is willing to compromise and the coming war will see entire worlds decimated for it.

But way out on the fringes of colonized space. On a lonely moon called Frontiers Reach. Captain Anya Zuban and First Mate Rhen Malavik are prepping their vessel, the Heliosiren, to lead a group of survivors deep into uncharted space to escape the coming war.

Choose your loadout

Each fighter in your hangar performs different duties but you are not restricted from choosing any of them. Pick the one you want and customize numerous aspects of it. From the color of the paint to the different types of modules and weapons that can be equipped.

Join the war effort and fight for control over the frontier

With more than 30 different locations in space and on planets there is a wide diversity of environments to run missions in. Whether you're fighting battles to win over planets, running skirmishes on friendly nodes, or rescuing vessels in distress to add to your fleet.

Art and World Building like no other

A military science fiction fantasy based on reality; Frontiers Reach takes heavy inspiration from the Cold War Era of the real world to create a brand new realm in the genres of science fiction and space games. A heavily stylized art direction that focuses on capturing the magic of Atompunk, Cassette Futurism, and Retro-futurist art styles from the mid 20th century.

This game uses AI generated content in the following ways.

Some 2D character art.

2 pieces of music.

The main narrative voice which is about 2 hours of dialogue generated with Microsoft Azure Neuro-Voice, an AI playing the role of an AI.
